references.reason: This paper introduces the INAR(1) process, a fundamental model for count time series data, which is directly relevant to the Poisson branching structural causal model studied in this paper.

references.paper_title: Causal discovery from discrete data using hidden compact representation
references.reason: This paper explores causal discovery methods from discrete data, a topic closely related to the work on Poisson count data in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Optimal structure identification with greedy search
references.reason: This paper presents a fundamental algorithm for causal structure learning, providing a crucial baseline method for comparison in this paper's experiments.

references.paper_title: Bayesian causal structural learning with zero-inflated poisson bayesian networks
references.reason: This paper addresses causal structure learning in the context of zero-inflated Poisson data, an important variation of count data considered in this paper.

references.paper_title: Review of causal discovery methods based on graphical models
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive review of causal discovery methods using graphical models, which forms the basis for comparing various methods used in this paper.
